text: <@UD53A9UUR> <@U2H1Q3F8R> I have a follow up question for you regarding setting up optional sections in my client's email templates! Is drag & drop another way to give them options? Do you know any helpful step-by-step documentation links for creating these kinds of email templates? Thank you!!
drag and drop is an option, but is implemented differently.  here is a page on it: `<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/email/create-marketing-emails-in-the-drag-and-drop-email-editor>`
i am not as well versed with the d&d
<@U7SL518D6> is an email guru and may be able to guide further.  there is also a channel <#CES6JU0RY|drag-drop-email-beta>

<@UD53A9UUR> <@U7SL518D6> Thanks guys! I was able to easily set up a drag & drop email template following the steps here <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/email/create-marketing-emails-in-the-drag-and-drop-email-editor>, but when I go to the email editor itself to test a new email creation, I don't actually see any drag & drop options, just standard modules!
that doesnt look like the d&d
<@UD53A9UUR> Yeah, that's what I mean! I created a drag & drop template foll0wing the instructions, but in the cms end, it doesn't give any drag & drop options!

<@UD53A9UUR> and <@U2H1Q3F8R> awesome efforts to help here, seriously.


<@UMH22MWD8> it appears you are a little confused over the drag and drop editor vs the drag and drop templates in the design manager.

Currently there is currently no way to make drag and drop editor templates in the design manager.

The drag and drop editor is the one you see in the screenshots on: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/email/create-marketing-emails-in-the-drag-and-drop-email-editor>

One route you could go is to create an email to be duplicated from, thus acting like a template.

Drag and Drop emails you will notice DO support modules, so you can create modules for it if needed.

<@U7SL518D6> Ah that helps clarify! I was trying to build a custom drag & drop template!

OK, when now go to Marketing > Email > Create email, I'm not seeing any option to select a drag & drop tab. Am I missing something! Thank you all for your help here!
it should actually appear right before that screen. When you click the button a little modal should appear asking you to pick a template or drag n drop
Ah that seems to be the issue, nothing drops down for me when I click the orange Create email button! Perhaps I need to call tech support?
I'm on with chat support now!
OK, turns out that since that feature is in beta, it wasn't yet turned on in my account! I see it now, and am a very happy camper : )
